skillTree.localised_description: Regular consumption of rotten meat and toxins are the staples of a healthy Ogre diet.
As menial slaves to the Butcher's bidding, these Gnoblars must find him meat for the pot, or wind up in it themselves.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10

skillTree.localised_description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Gnoblars and Hobgoblins units
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +2 for Gnoblars and Hobgoblins units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.
Puny magicks are nothing in the face of the Great Maw's endless hunger.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Bullgorger Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Braingobbler Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Toothcracker Upgraded"

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Bonecrusher Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Once the slaughter begins, every foe is but meat yet to be carved.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Trollguts Upgraded"

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Maw"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Maw Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Maw Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
Where this one goes, his meat-pot goes too, as a bounteous reserve for his spells.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Stop yer wriggling, meatbag! Into the pot you go!"

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%

skillTree.localised_description: Only when bathed in blood and gore can the Gastromancy of the Great Maw be channelled.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2

skillTree.localised_description: A full meat-pot and stolen enemy plans really does wonders for camp morale.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: If the shock of your limbs being cleaved clean off doesn't kill you, the poison on the blade surely will.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%

skillTree.localised_description: Wherever the Butcher goes, a trail of dismembered limbs is sure to be left behind him.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10%
	(When this Hero is not embedded)

skillTree.localised_description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +3% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(own characters in region)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 4
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.
Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison
Witnessing other friendly units rout will only affect this unit's leadership if they also have the Contempt attribute.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The gourmands of the ogre kingdoms, butchers are held in high esteem, as a tribe with a skilled cook will be far happier than one without.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Rune Maw"
	(Characters in hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

nodes.localised_description: You don't want to look 'im in the eye Bolgut, trust me on that.
